Name: The First Track
About the game: The First Track It is using realistic physics simulation tank track's vehicle game (not tank battle game) Track can break out of vehicle like in real life tank track vehicle also you can fix it when track break You can install or uninstall some components whatever you want You can control 2 same model vehicle in scene with special control system to challenge your control skill Game also has ability for Towing ...u control one tank and can Tow a another tank using the Tow add-on with other add-on's being planned (must be installed'Hook') Game uses advanced real time physics for track simulation and realistic control setup also suspension horsepower The tracks are fully breakable as well as parts on the tank Player can also switch tank components on the fly
Meta Title: The First Track: Jan 31, 2019, CSF and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The First Track? Check out the release date (Jan 31, 2019), developer insights from CSF, and a complete game summary.
